Skill.source: Item:5:Shroud of the Lightless, Carnal Armour

PathOfBuilding.Notes:
For the bossing setup I am using a Cinderswallow and Bottled Faith to replace the quicksilver and diamond flask, respectively. This is because I am crit-capped even without the diamond flask and Bottled faith provides BiS damage.
For mapping, an Alchemist's Quicksilver flask of Adrenaline is BiS alongside an "of heat" diamond flask.
It is important that we hit 100% hit chance. We accomplish this by using an Ice Golem and leveling our preicision aura to the exact level where we hit 100% hit chance. It is even reccomended to craft accuracy on some pieces of gear to ensure we hit 100% hit chance.
Our evasion is quite low. We rely on knowledge of game mechanics to survive reliably. You will not face-tank the entire game's content with ease. It is possible, and relatively easy, to not die if you are paying attention and making sure you throw out KB before using dash so that any white mobs get chilled/shattered before having a chance to attack and possibly stun-chain you.
https://www.reddit.com/r/pathofexile/comments/hrih5f/power_siphon_kb_wander_handling_a8_sirus_last/
